sentences.sentence: Here was treasure-hunting under the happiest auspices--there would not be any bothersome uncertainty as to where to dig.
sentences.translation: 这里真是找宝的好地方，到哪里去挖，一点也不麻烦。

sentences.sentence: Just because I would not listen to that bothersome Cricket, who knows how many misfortunes may be awaiting me!
sentences.translation: 就因为我不听那讨厌的蟋蟀的话，谁知道会有多少不幸在等着我呢！

sentences.sentence: But this is starting to get bothersome.
sentences.translation: 但是现在开始有些烦人了。
